resources.string:
AIRShare allows you to share data from your phone with devices on the same wifi network.
 AIRShare can share :
 - images
 - videos
 - binary files
 - text
 - contacts
 - Map position
 It is easy to use. Make sure you are connected to a wifi network.
 Click on the share button anywhere on android and pick AIRShare.
 When launched you can scan the qrcode or type the url displayed in a browser or bring another device close your phone to transfer the adress via NFC.
 The web browser should launch on the other device and download the data.
 Have hun ;)
We can\'t share data from this data source yet. May be later ;)
